definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: Ge 10:3 = ´[[תּו]]: 1Ch 1:6; ´[[בֵּית תּו]]: Ez Eze 27:14, Eze 38:6; Qorgama, Qerg., etc.; it lay in (SW.) Armenia acc. to Di:Ge 10:2 (and reff.), D1:Pa 246 (Til-garimmu); > NW. Asia Minor (Gk. Teuqrani/a) Lag:Ges. Abh. 257; Armen. Stud. § 865; Abh. GGW. xxxv (1888). 142.
